Name: Beat Flip
About the game: Somewhere between a Rhythm and Puzzle game, Beat Flip is a casual game that will challenge both your reflexes and your mind. Flip or push the tiles to match the ones falling each beat. Try to get a high score and play through several difficulty modes. Featuring an original soundtrack, and unlockable color schemes.
